00038 QRgb VolumeRenderer::transfer(float value)
00039 {
00040     value = value < 0.f ? 0.f : value;
00041     value = value > 1.f ? 1.f : value;
00042 
00043     int index = value * (transferLUT.width() - 1);
00044 
00045     return transferLUT.pixel(index, 0);
00046 }
00047 
00048 void VolumeRenderer::updateTransfer()
00049 {
00050     QGradient g = QLinearGradient(QPoint(0, 0), QPoint(transferLUT.width(),0));
00051 
00052     for (int i=0; i<m_stops.size(); ++i) {
00053         g.setColorAt(m_stops.at(i).first, m_stops.at(i).second);
00054     }
00055 
00056     g.setSpread(QGradient::PadSpread);
00057 
00058     transferLUT.fill(0x00000000);
00059     QPainter *p = new QPainter(&transferLUT);
00060 
00061     p->setBrush(g);
00062     p->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
00063 
00064     p->drawRect(transferLUT.rect());
00065 
00066     delete p;
00067 }
00068 
00069 void VolumeRenderer::setGradientStops(const QGradientStops &stops)
00070 {
00071     m_stops = stops;
00072 
00073     updateTransfer();
00074 
00075     updateGL();
00076 }

00078 void VolumeRenderer::setVolume(Volume *volume)
00079 {
00080     this->volume = volume;
00081 
00082 
00083     GLfloat *data = new GLfloat[volume->GetSize()];
00084     /*for (int i = 0; i < volume->GetWidth(); ++i)
00085     {
00086         for (int j = 0; j < volume->GetHeight(); ++j)
00087         {
00088             for (int i = 0; i < volume->GetDepth(); ++k)
00089             {
00090             }
00091         }
00092     }
00093     */
00094     for (int i = 0; i < volume->GetSize(); ++i)
00095     {
00096         data[i] = volume->Get(i).GetValue();
00097     }
00098 
00099     glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
00100     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_3D, textureName);
00101 
00102     //glTexImage3DEXT1(GL_TEXTURE_3D, 0, GL_ALPHA,
00103     glTexImage3D(GL_TEXTURE_3D, 0, GL_ALPHA,
00104                  volume->GetWidth(), volume->GetHeight(), volume->GetDepth(),
00105                  0, GL_ALPHA, GL_FLOAT, data);
00106 
00107     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_3D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER,GL_LINEAR);
00108     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_3D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER,GL_LINEAR);
00109 
00110     delete[] data;
00111 
00112     updateGL();
00113 }
00114 
00115 void VolumeRenderer::setTransfer()
00116 {
00117     glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE1);
00118     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_1D, transferTextureName);
00119 
00120     GLuint *data = new GLuint[transferLUT.width()];
00121     for (int i=0; i<transferLUT.width(); i++) {
00122         QRgb pixel = transferLUT.pixel(i, 0);
00123         GLuint pixel_t = (pixel&0xff000000)
00124                          | ((pixel&0x00ff0000)>>16)
00125                          | (pixel&0x0000ff00)
00126                          | ((pixel&0x000000ff)<<16);
00127         data[i] = pixel_t;
00128     }
00129 
00130     glTexImage1D(GL_TEXTURE_1D, 0, 4, transferLUT.width(), 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, data);
00131     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_1D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00132     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_1D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00133 
00134     delete[] data;
00135 }

00141     updateGL();

00205  static void qNormalizeAngle(int &angle)
00206  {
00207      while (angle < 0)
00208          angle += 360 * 16;
00209      while (angle > 360 * 16)
00210          angle -= 360 * 16;
00211  }
00212 
00213  void VolumeRenderer::setXRotation(int angle)
00214  {
00215      qNormalizeAngle(angle);
00216      if (angle != xRot) {
00217          xRot = angle;
00218          emit xRotationChanged(angle);
00219          updateGL();
00220      }
00221  }
00222 
00223  void VolumeRenderer::setYRotation(int angle)
00224  {
00225      qNormalizeAngle(angle);
00226      if (angle != yRot) {
00227          yRot = angle;
00228          emit yRotationChanged(angle);
00229          updateGL();
00230      }
00231  }
00232 
00233  void VolumeRenderer::setZRotation(int angle)
00234  {
00235      qNormalizeAngle(angle);
00236      if (angle != zRot) {
00237          zRot = angle;
00238          emit zRotationChanged(angle);
00239          updateGL();
00240      }
00241  }

00243  void VolumeRenderer::initializeGL()
00244  {
00245      glewInit();
00246      std::cerr << "Widget is valid: " << isValid() << std::endl;
00247      std::cerr << "context " << QGLContext::currentContext() << std::endl;
00248      std::cerr << "has OpenGL shader: " << QGLShaderProgram::hasOpenGLShaderPrograms() << std::endl;
00249      std::cerr << "context " << context() << " is valid " << context()->isValid() << std::endl;
00250      program = new QGLShaderProgram(context());
00251 
00252 
00253 
00254      //qglClearColor(qtPurple.dark());
00255      glClearColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
00256 
00257      glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00258      glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00259      glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00260      glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00261      glEnable(GL_LIGHT0);
00262      glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE);
00263      glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_1D);
00264      glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_3D);
00265      static GLfloat lightPosition[4] = { 0.5, 5.0, 7.0, 1.0 };
00266      glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION, lightPosition);
00267 
00268      program->addShaderFromSourceCode(QGLShader::Vertex,
00269          "attribute highp vec4 vertex;\n"
00270          "attribute vec4 texCoord;"
00271          "void main(void)\n"
00272          "{\n"
00273          "   gl_Position = vertex;\n"
00274          "  gl_TexCoord[0] = texCoord;"
00275          "}");
00276      std::cout << "Vertex shader log: " << program->log().toStdString().c_str() << std::endl;
00277 
00278      program->addShaderFromSourceFile(QGLShader::Fragment, "../Beispiel1/FragmentShader.glsl");
00279 
00280      std::cerr << "Fragment shader log: " << program->log().toStdString().c_str() << std::endl;
00281      program->link();
00282      std::cout << "Shader link log: " << program->log().toStdString().c_str() << std::endl;
00283      program->bind();
00284 
00285      vertexLocation = program->attributeLocation("vertex");
00286      texCoordLocation = program->attributeLocation("texCoord");
00287 
00288      n0Location = program->uniformLocation("n0");
00289      uLocation = program->uniformLocation("u");
00290      vLocation = program->uniformLocation("v");
00291      volumeSizeLocation = program->uniformLocation("volumeSize");
00292      volumeResolutionLocation = program->uniformLocation("volumeResolution");
00293      NLocation = program->uniformLocation("N");
00294      samplerLocation = program->uniformLocation("sampler");
00295      lightColorLocation = program->uniformLocation("c_light");
00296      ambientColorLocation = program->uniformLocation("c_ambient");
00297      diffuseColorLocation = program->uniformLocation("c_diffuse");
00298      specularColorLocation = program->uniformLocation("c_specular");
00299      specularExponentLocation = program->uniformLocation("c_exponent");
00300      transferLocation = program->uniformLocation("transferSampler");
00301      k1Location = program->uniformLocation("k1");
00302      k2Location = program->uniformLocation("k2");
00303 
00304      // 3D texture
00305      glGenTextures(1, &textureName);
00306      glGenTextures(1, &transferTextureName);
00307 
00308      //glTexImage3D = (PFNGLTEXIMAGE3DPROC) wglGetProcAddress("glTexImage3D");
00309     //glTexImage3DEXT1 = (PFNGLTEXIMAGE3DEXTPROC)wglGetProcAddress("glTexImage3DEXT");
00310 
00311 
00312  }
00313 
00314  void VolumeRenderer::paintGL()
00315  {
00316      glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00317 
00318      if (! volume || ! options)
00319          return;
00320 
00321      float x = width/4, y = height/4;
00322     x = 1.f; y = 1.f;
00323 
00324      static GLfloat const quadVertices[] = {
00325          x,  y, 0.0f,
00326         -x,  y, 0.0f,
00327         -x, -y, 0.0f,
00328          x, -y, 0.0f
00329     };
00330 
00331      static GLfloat const texCoords[] = {
00332          width / 2,  height / 2,
00333         -width / 2,  height / 2,
00334         -width / 2, -height / 2,
00335          width / 2, -height / 2,
00336      };
00337 
00338      QMatrix4x4 pmvMatrix;
00339      pmvMatrix.rotate(xRot, QVector3D(1.f, 0, 0));
00340      pmvMatrix.rotate(yRot, QVector3D(0, 1.f, 0));
00341      pmvMatrix.rotate(zRot, QVector3D(0, 0, 1.f));
00342 
00343      QVector3D n0 = pmvMatrix * QVector3D(0, 0, -1.f);
00344      // FIXME: keep aspect ratio
00345      QVector3D u = pmvMatrix * QVector3D(1.f / width, 0, 0) * 2;
00346      QVector3D v = pmvMatrix * QVector3D(0, 1.f / height, 0) * 2;
00347 
00348      QVector3D volumeResolution(volume->GetWidth(), volume->GetHeight(), volume->GetDepth());
00349 
00350      QVector3D volumeSize(volumeResolution);
00351      float max = volumeSize.x();
00352      if (volumeSize.y() > max)
00353          max = volumeSize.y();
00354      if (volumeSize.z() > max)
00355          max = volumeSize.z();
00356      volumeSize *= 1 / max;
00357 
00358      program->enableAttributeArray(vertexLocation);
00359      program->setAttributeArray(vertexLocation, quadVertices, 3);
00360      program->enableAttributeArray(texCoordLocation);
00361      program->setAttributeArray(texCoordLocation, texCoords, 2);
00362 
00363      program->setUniformValue(n0Location, n0);
00364      program->setUniformValue(uLocation, u);
00365      program->setUniformValue(vLocation, v);
00366      program->setUniformValue(NLocation, options->N);
00367      program->setUniformValue(volumeSizeLocation, volumeSize);
00368      program->setUniformValue(volumeResolutionLocation, volumeResolution);
00369      program->setUniformValue(samplerLocation, 0);
00370      program->setUniformValue(lightColorLocation, options->light);
00371      program->setUniformValue(ambientColorLocation, options->ambient);
00372      program->setUniformValue(diffuseColorLocation, options->diffuse);
00373      program->setUniformValue(specularColorLocation, options->specular);
00374      program->setUniformValue(specularExponentLocation, options->exponent);
00375      program->setUniformValue(transferLocation, 1);
00376      program->setUniformValue(k1Location, options->k1);
00377      program->setUniformValue(k2Location, options->k2);
00378 
00379      glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
00380      glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_3D, textureName);
00381      glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE1);
00382      glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_1D, transferTextureName);
00383 
00384      glDrawArrays(GL_QUADS, 0, 4);
00385 
00386      program->disableAttributeArray(vertexLocation);
00387      program->disableAttributeArray(texCoordLocation);
00388  }

00394

00396

00398     this->height = height;
00399

00402      glLoadIdentity();

00409  void VolumeRenderer::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
00410  {
00411      lastPos = event->pos();
00412  }
00413 
00414  void VolumeRenderer::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
00415  {
00416      int dx = event->x() - lastPos.x();
00417      int dy = event->y() - lastPos.y();
00418 
00419      static const float s = 1.f;
00420      if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton) {
00421          setXRotation(xRot + s * dy);
00422          setYRotation(yRot + s * dx);
00423      } else if (event->buttons() & Qt::RightButton) {
00424          setXRotation(xRot + s * dy);
00425          setZRotation(zRot + s * dx);
00426      }
00427      lastPos = event->pos();
00428  }
